code: export var RECEIVE_USERS='RECEIVE_USERS';export var ADD_NEW_POLL_TO_USER='ADD_NEW_POLL_TO_USER';export var ADD_ANSWERED_POLL_TO_USER='ADD_ANSWERED_POLL_TO_USER';export function receiveUsers(users){return{type:RECEIVE_USERS,payload:{users:users}};}export function addNewPollToUser(user,pollId){return{type:ADD_NEW_POLL_TO_USER,payload:{user:user,pollId:pollId}};}export function addAnsweredPollToUser(user,pollId){return{type:ADD_ANSWERED_POLL_TO_USER,payload:{user:user,pollId:pollId}};}
